DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate potential clinical benefit trilaciclib ( G1T28 ) preserve bone marrow immune system , enhance chemotherapy antitumor efficacy administer prior topotecan patient previously treat extensive-stage SCLC . The study consist 2 part : limited open-label , dose-finding portion ( Part 1 ) , randomize double-blind portion ( Part 2 ) . Both part include 3 study phase : Screening Phase , Treatment Phase , Survival Follow-up Phase . The Treatment Phase begin day first dose study treatment complete Post-Treatment Visit . The open-label portion enrol 32 patient randomized portion enroll approximately 60 patient .
